text: Langenthal is a town in the administrative district of Oberaargau in the canton of Bern in Switzerland. On 1 January 2010, the former municipality of Untersteckholz merged into the municipality of Langenthal. On 1 January 2021 the Obersteckholz became part of Langenthal. Langenthal is an educational, cultural, and economic center for the region of Oberaargau. ==Gallery== File:Langenthal 039.jpg|Langenthal File:Langenthal-Langete.jpg|Langete ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website of Langenthal Category:Municipalities in Oberaargau Category:Cities in Switzerland
title: Langenthal
